short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A visual representation of how dependent you are on Stack Overflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension visualises your visits and bookmarks to stackoverflow.com. Display your most trusted developer resource right where you need it.

You can also add additional websites to keep track of in tandem with (or instead of) stackoverflow.com.

Add your Stack Overflow user id in the options page to see more of your usage stats.

How bad is your code? does not have any ads nor does it send user data anywhere. See the code @ https://github.com/mtu2/how-bad-is-your-code
